room_title: Escape room "Massacre" by Colonial Escape Room in Williamsburg
review: This was our first time at an escape room. We did the "Massacre" room. It was creepy and a little scary, and definitely challenging. We had a great time and will definitely be returning!

room_title: Escape room "Massacre" by Colonial Escape Room in Williamsburg
review: My first escape room. We chose the massacre room. It was hard, but we all had fun trying to solve it. The owners definitely are creative and make it challenging. It wouldn't be fun if it were easy. I will definitely go back.

room_title: Escape room "Massacre" by Colonial Escape Room in Williamsburg
review: We enjoyed the Massacre room. It took us slightly more than an hour to solve, but they let us finish. The puzzles were of reasonable difficulty for our 4-person crew. We would love to do the other two rooms sometime soon.

room_title: Escape room "Massacre" by Colonial Escape Room in Williamsburg
review: Did the Massacre room with my husband for our wedding anniversary. Absolutely loved it. The people that work there are awesome, too!
